<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lion Claw](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1024)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 174 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You're [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) by a creature and are a master in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15).
</row>

</column>

---

This dried claw from a mighty beast bestows upon you the ability of a predator. When you activate the claw, you learn to pounce on your prey in one fluid motion. You Stride and then Strike with the affixed weapon against one creature you were undetected by. You remain undetected by the creature until after you Strike.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
